title: Jesy Nelson flaunts her new-found confidence with sizzling social media snaps
text:

Little Mix's Jesy Nelson showed her fans she is feeling happy and healthy in herself with her latest Instagram offerings.

The pop sensation, 28, oozed confidence in the three sultry snaps she shared with her 6.1 million followers on Tuesday.

Wowing in a white crop top teamed with camel coloured trousers and a matching blazer - that she shrugged on her forearms - Jesy stood with her legs open and gave a powerful stare down the camera lens.

Curvy Jesy ensured her ample assets took centre stage thanks to the low-cut scoop neck detail of her top.

(Image: instagram)

The vixen decorated her neck with a choker by French fashion house Chanel that featured two interlocking C's across her collarbone.

Looking every inch the beauty, the Romford native wore a silver wig that was styled in mermaid waves that cascaded down to her hips.

Enhancing her looks, the pretty singer lined her lips with a nude liner and dusted a palette of gold shadow on her eye-lids.

(Image: instagram)

(Image: instagram)

Jesy recently went public with her desperate bid to end her life in a new documentary Jesy Nelson: Odd One Out.

During the emotional documentary, Jesy herself opens up on finding fame and her struggle with vile online trolls.

She was even driven to the brink of suicide and tried to take her own life after being fat-shamed after an X Factor performance in November 2016.

Jesy said: "The whole world had an opinion on me and they weren’t good ones. I wasn’t known as one of the singers in Little Mix I was known as the fat ugly one.

(Image: Instagram)

"It literally consumed every part of me. I hit such a low point in my life I just topped turning up for work. What they said to me still effects me now.

"It doesn’t matter if you are in the public eye or not you can’t get away from social media and it is ruining people's lives. We all need to talk more on how this is making us feel."

description: The Little Mix star, who bravely opened up on her trolling hell in her documentary Odd One Out, has showcased her confident side on Instagram
